creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
description: two fine woven panels, hand sewn with black background; each panel has a woven multicolored side border (6") and horizontal multicolored bands in different geometric pattern at each end; attached mostly black fringe
dimension:
154 1/2 x 45 1/2 in. (392.43 x 115.57 cm) (including fringe)
1 1/2 in. (3.81 cm) (fringe, at each end)
title: shawl
